name: The Cabin (itch) (TheDre)
description:
As a researcher you find yourself lost in the woods after taking a night's sleep in the shimmer. Upon waking up, you realise some days has past and the forest isn't what it seems to be and so you decide to explore more of the shimmer. 

What more does the shimmer offer in this strange place? It's now up to you, to discover for yourself!

The game was made within three weeks with the idea of capturing a certain experience that the movie represented. For our project we chose the movie Annihilation and decided to focus ourselves on the different mutation that took place during the movie.

We sincerely hope that you will enjoy our little experience game!

Made by:

Chelsey Severi
Luca Naselli
Andrea Grimaldi
